00576224.json.system_prompt: You solve puzzles by transforming the input into the output. You are expert at the PGM (Portable Graymap) format.
00576224.json.user_prompt:
# Transformations
## Transformation A - Input
```
[[8, 6], [6, 4]]
```
## Transformation A - Output
```
[[8, 6, 8, 6, 8, 6], [6, 4, 6, 4, 6, 4], [6, 8, 6, 8, 6, 8], [4, 6, 4, 6, 4, 6], [8, 6, 8, 6, 8, 6], [6, 4, 6, 4, 6, 4]]
```
## Transformation B - Input
```
[[3, 2], [7, 8]]
```
## Transformation B - Output
```
# Predict this output
```
Wrap your output matrix in <Matrix> and </Matrix>.
